name: Diary of an unborn
description:
What is the game about?

The game is about a fetus that is aborted. He must find peace by climbing a tower with nine puzzles inside of it.

Estimated time to complete

Half an hour if you do it in one run. But, if not, one hour, more or less.

The music, graphics, etc:

The OST was composed by me. The tilesets were made by me, mixing some pictures in pohotshop. In fact, the graphical aspect of the game, is photoshoped as hell.

Screenshots:

Do I need to have the RTP:

It comes with the installation, so no.
